attributes.action: stop fathers being able to desert their wifes & children leaving them homeless with their debts from being able to get away with having to provide for them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to stop Fathers from deserting the familes and leaving them homeless and in debt. There are so many woman that are cheated out of their life savings, homes, left in debt while the man can move on. Yet still drag the woman to court for access, which they always get. Make them pay for their accomodation. Never mind fathers for justice they are overshadowing the millions of woman that need help not just for themselves but their children. What chance do they have to start over.
